class.name: EditorFileSystemImportFormatSupportQuery
class.brief_description: Used to query and configure import format support.
class.description: This class is used to query and configure a certain import format. It is used in conjunction with asset format import plugins.

method.name: _is_active
method.description: Return whether this importer is active.

method.name: _query
method.description: Query support. Return [code]false[/code] if import must not continue.
